name: Overview
helpText: A snapshot of the retailer's performance across a number of key indicators.

name: Media Performance
helpText: Performance across the factors that capture the level of excitement and attention around each retailer.

name: Net Buzz
helpText: The difference between positive and negative buzz

name: Buzz Noise
helpText: The total of positive and negative buzz

name: Positive Buzz
helpText:
Those who have heard something positive about each retailer in the last month (stated as a percentage of all respondents).
Q: Which of the following womenswear retailers have you heard something POSITIVE about in the last month?

name: Negative Buzz
helpText:
Those who have heard something negative about each retailer in the last month (stated as a percentage of all respondents).
Q: Which of the following womenswear retailers have you heard something NEGATIVE about in the last month?

name: Advertising Awareness
helpText:
Those who have seen advertising for each retailer in the last month (stated as a percentage of all respondents).
Q: Have you seen ADVERTISING for any of the following retailers in the last month?

name: Brand Health
helpText: Performance across the factors that capture the knowledge and affection for each retailer that can lead to purchase.

name: Awareness
helpText:
The awareness of the retailers (stated as a percentage of all respondents who don't state 'I do not know this brand').
Q: When, if ever, have you bought womenswear from the following retailer?

name: Familiarity
helpText:
The familiarity of the retailers (stated as a percentage of all respondents who don't state 'I do not have an opinion of this retailer').
Q: How would you describe your opinion of the following WOMENSWEAR retailers?

name: Affinity
helpText:
The affinity level of the retailers (stated as a percentage of all respondents who are familiar with the retailer and state they 'love' the retailer or 'like it a lot').
Q: How would you describe your opinion of the following WOMENSWEAR retailers?

name: Love
helpText:
The love for the retailers (stated as a percentage of all respondents who are familiar with the retailer and state they 'love' the retailer).
Q: How would you describe your opinion of the following WOMENSWEAR retailers?

name: Consideration
helpText:
The consideration of the retailers (stated as a percentage of all respondents).
Q: Thinking about womenswear, which of the following retailers would you CONSIDER buying clothes, footwear and accessories from?

name: Preference
helpText:
The preference of the retailers (stated as a percentage of all respondents).
Q: And of the womenswear retailers you would consider, which would describe as your FAVOURITES?

name: Demand & Usage
helpText: The visitation and usage of each retailer by channel on an annual and monthly basis.

name: Visited In-Store (LM)
helpText:
The in-store visitation of the retailers over the past 30 days (stated as a percentage of all respondents).
Q: Which of the following womenswear retailers have you visited IN-STORE in the last month?

name: Visited Online (LM)
helpText:
The online vistation of the retailers over the past 30 days (stated as a percentage of all respondents).
Q: Which of the following womenswear retailers have you visited ONLINE in the last month?

name: Visited Overall (LM)
helpText: Visited the retailer in-store OR online in the last month

name: Bought In-Store (LM)
helpText:
The in-store penetration of the retailers over the past 30 days (stated as a percentage of all respondents).
Q: From which of the following retailers have you BOUGHT womenswear IN-STORE in the last MONTH?

name: Bought Online (LM)
helpText:
The online penetration of the retailers over the past 30 days (stated as a percentage of all respondents).
Q: From which of the following retailers have you BOUGHT womenswear ONLINE in the last MONTH?

name: Bought Overall (LM)
helpText: Bought from the retailer in-store OR online in the last month

name: Conversion In-Store (LM)
helpText: % of those who visited IN-STORE who subsequently purchased

name: Conversion Online (LM)
helpText: % of those who visited ONLINE who subsequently purchased

name: Purchase Frequency In-Store (L12M)
helpText: How many times have you PURCHASED womenswear from these retailers IN-STORE in the last year? (Among those who purchased any womenswear)

name: Purchase Frequency Online (L12M)
helpText: How many times have you PURCHASED womenswear from these retailers ONLINE in the last year? (Among those who purchased any womenswear)

name: Spend In-Store (LM)
helpText: How much did you spend at each retailer IN-STORE in the last month on womenswear?

name: Spend Online (LM)
helpText: How much did you spend at each retailer ONLINE in the last month on womenswear?

name: Penetration (L12M)
helpText:
The penetration of the retailers over the last 12 months (stated as a percentage of all respondents who state 'PURCHASED - in the last 12 months').
Q: When, if ever, have you bought womenswear from the following retailer?

name: Ever Bought
helpText:
The penetration of the retailers over the last 12 months and beyond (stated as a percentage of all respondents who state 'PURCHASED - in the last 12 months' or 'PURCHASED - more than 12 months ago').
Q: When, if ever, have you bought womenswear from the following retailer?

name: Lost demand
helpText: The lost customer demand on an annual and monthly basis.

name: Lapsed (L12M)
helpText:
The level of lapsed customers of the retailers (stated as a percentage of all respondents who state 'PURCHASED - more than 12 months ago').
Q: When, if ever, have you bought womenswear from the following retailer?

name: Never Bought
helpText:
% of people who have never bought from the retailer (including those who are unaware).
Q: When, if ever, have you bought womenswear from the following retailer?

name: In-store:Better fitting products
helpText: Q: What would have motivated you to make a purchase from (retailer) in-store when you JUST BROWSED?

helpText: Q: What would have motivated you to make a purchase from (retailer) in-store when you JUST BROWSED?

name: In-store:Better store layout
helpText: Q: What would have motivated you to make a purchase from (retailer) in-store when you JUST BROWSED?

name: Online:Better fitting products
helpText: Q: What would have motivated you to make a purchase from (retailer) online when you JUST BROWSED?

name: Online:Better priced products
helpText: Q: What would have motivated you to make a purchase from (retailer) online when you JUST BROWSED?

name: Online:Better quality products
helpText: Q: What would have motivated you to make a purchase from (retailer) online when you JUST BROWSED?

name: Online:Products available in my size
helpText: Q: What would have motivated you to make a purchase from (retailer) online when you JUST BROWSED?

name: Online:Better range of styles
helpText: Q: What would have motivated you to make a purchase from (retailer) online when you JUST BROWSED?

name: Online:Easier navigation
helpText: Q: What would have motivated you to make a purchase from (retailer) online when you JUST BROWSED?

name: Online:Better delivery options
helpText: Q: What would have motivated you to make a purchase from (retailer) online when you JUST BROWSED?

name: Online:Better product presentation
helpText: Q: What would have motivated you to make a purchase from (retailer) online when you JUST BROWSED?

name: Customer Experience
helpText: The level of customer satisfaction and advocacy for the retailers.

name: Satisfaction In-Store
helpText: Q: Thinking about some of the retailers you have visited IN-STORE in the last month, how would you rate your level of SATISFACTION with the retailer overall? (Scores 8 or above as a % of total)

name: Satisfaction Online
helpText: Q: Thinking about some of the retailers you have visited ONLINE in the last month, how would you rate your level of SATISFACTION with the retailer overall? (Scores 8 or above as a % of total)

name: Advocacy
helpText:
The level of advocacy for the retailers by those have been customers in the past 30 days (stated as a Net Promoter Score - the 'percentage of promoters' minus the 'percentage of detractors').
Q: Considering the womenswear retailers you have bought from, on a scale of 0-10 how likely would you be to recommend them to friends / family?

name: Promoters
helpText: The % of Promoters (rating 9-10) among those who have been customers in the past 30 days

name: Detractors
helpText: The % of Detractors (rating 0-6) among those who have been customers in the past 30 days

name: Passives
helpText: The % of Passives (rating 7-8) among those who have been customers in the past 30 days

name: Image
helpText: The image performance of the retailer

name: CPM
helpText: A strategic map of how consumers perceive your product offer against pricing perception.  Developed by Oliver Wyman, it identifies the important factors driving satisfaction.

name: CPM - Customer Perception Map, coming in June
Contact your Account Manager to learn more

helpText: Download reports and quarterly presentations for your brands
